import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-landing-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { currentYear!: number; constructor () { } ngOnInit(): void { this.currentYear = Date.now(); } }
